name: Anna
comment: I had a problem with my Iphone, the Camera App wasn't working, but Alex, the sweetest guy fixed within a minute. I definitely recomend this place!

name: David
comment: I wanted to surprise my girlfriend with a new phone, but I wasn't sure which one would she like. Tamara gave me the best advice, my girlfriend was thrilled!

name: Jake
comment: Proffesional. Quality. Safe buy. Best store in Seattle!

name: Meredith
comment: I had a problem with my headphones, it was a small problem with wire connection and Alex fixed it for free!
